entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 1.
